WiTeX

simple wrapper of MathJax.

View on GitHub Download .zip Download .tar.gz

Default: skipStartupTypeset: true

$\therefore 0 < S\leqslant \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$

get render result with callback

code:
import WiTex from '../../src/';

var testText = '$\therefore 0 < S\leqslant \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$';

WiTex.render(testText, result => {
    document.getElementById('second').innerHTML = result.html;
});
result:

render Element by id

html:
<p id="third">$\therefore 0 > S\leqslant \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$</p>
code:
WiTex.render('third');
result:

$\therefore 0 < S\leqslant \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$

Witex is maintained by ntyfx.
